'''Olof Carlson''' was a [[Realms]] developer at [[Mojang Studios]], who started at the company on March 29, 2016.<ref>{{tweet|westmaaan|716864352880627712|Excited to be doing my first day today at Mojang in Stockholm, working on Minecraft Realms with @Marc_IRL @zeeraw @DMarby!|Mar 29, 2016}}</ref>
